t: Do consumer UV light sanitizer boxes work? Which is the best brand to get, especially for paperwork and mobile phones? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 4): “Do consumer UV light sanitizer boxes work?” Yes. They take money out of your wallet three ways (purchase, operation, and induced damage). They also give you a false sense of security, since RNA viruses like COVID-19 are transparent to UV.
